title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Bio Science Stream
description: Excel in the G.C.E. A/L Bio Science stream. Achieving a very high Z-score is mandatory for admission into a state medical faculty in Sri Lanka. Subjects are Biology, Chemistry, and Physics.
qualifications: G.C.E. A/L (Bio Science) with high Z-score

title: MBBS Degree
description: Complete the Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) degree from a recognized medical faculty. This is an intensive program covering all aspects of medical science.
institutes: Faculty of Medicine, University of Colombo
General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU)

title: Internship (Medical Officer)
description: Complete a mandatory one-year internship at a government hospital under the supervision of senior consultants. This provides hands-on experience in major specialities like Medicine, Surgery, Paediatrics, and Gynaecology.

title: Post-Internship Medical Officer (MO)
description: After successful completion of the internship, you receive full registration from the Sri Lanka Medical Council (SLMC) and can work as a Medical Officer in the government or private sector.

title: Postgraduate Specialization (MD/MS)
description: To become a specialist (e.g., Cardiologist, Surgeon, Paediatrician), you must pass a competitive postgraduate entrance exam (MD/MS) and undergo rigorous training for several years, including overseas training.
qualifications: MD or MS in a chosen speciality
institutes: Postgraduate Institute of Medicine (PGIM), University of Colombo
